TopicTitle: [EVA] Allow camera rotation to control kerbals pitch.

Articles.Content:
As it stands now when on EVA you can use the mouse to control the yaw of your kerbal but you can not change the pitch.

All i want is the pitch to work the same as the yaw.

It would be great. There already is a setting that allows the Kerbals to change and move in different pitch angles(you control it by left-clicking and moving the mouse though). It's better than the stock system already.

Just look in your settings.cfg file and change 

    EVA_ROTATE_ON_MOVE = True

to 

    EVA_ROTATE_ON_MOVE = False

This makes them move independently from the camera angle. But it free's up orientation control of the Kerbals.
